name: Time Commando

files.install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/game/TIMECO.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/game"
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
